title: I might join PES(rr) and have some questions about hostel
content: I have wrote DCET(KEA) and I might get PES(rr) CS and I was thinking of joining hostel their. I want to know what's the cost of hostel their and should I join hostel or not if yes then is it okay to bring my PC their as I don't have laptop. Does the fee waiver thing also apply for hostel fee. I fear I might lose my gpu if I bring my pc so plz give advice it may be any hostel or pg I don't want to lose my pc.

comments.body: You are in luck my friend, don't ovetthink, cuz hostels are filled completely
What do you mean by filled, can I get a hostel or not and is it okay to bring pc their
The hoestels are filled to the brim, u can go for pgs,and pgs they don't care if u bring a pc or a girl tbh
Dude Iam less concerned about bringing pc than getting my gpu stolen
No bro 3060 but I got some valuable shit
Where u going to pg btw,,,,for no particular reason
Still need to decide bro option entry isn't out yet for us so preparing up for it in advance to bag the seat in the first round itself
